entries.meaning: (zoology, taxonomy) The first legitimate name of a taxon, on which the currently accepted name is based.
examples: The protonym of Macroscyphus appears to be Nees von Esenbeck's (1817) [genus] Peziza ...

entries.meaning: (prescriptive, uncommon) The first/original entity after which another entity is named without the entities being related. If the entities are related, then the original entity is the eponym of the subsequent entities.
